tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have been taking treatment from the doctor for almost 4 years. But the frontal weak dentures needed to be fixed at the earliest due to repeated breaks in all front teeth.
I wanted a complete solution of my upper denture without affecting my work which is a more into customer handling.  There was no chance I could leave without a front teeth for long. Surprisingly she gave me acrylic dentures till my stitches and implant healed inside. 
This is something I am really happy about and the final product that came after the period of healing was just perfect. 
I am very glad to have it done by her only. 
I can definitely advise her as a very good dentist. My son is also having dental issue resolution through her only. And yes there is smooth payment plan.
That’s it

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Ruupali has always explained the problems, it's reasons and the science behind why or how the particular problem took place and in such a way that it was understandable even without knowing much about dental science. It gave me knowledge and understanding about my own problems which as a patient, was a very assuring for me as I used to have a lot of questions. All the questions were handled and explained by the doctor in a sweet and patient way and I appreciate that. I am grateful for the services I recieved from Doctor Ruupali and Smile Edge clinic. I would definitely recommend it ahead!

Exceptional Care and Outstanding Results!

Rating: 5/5 stars

We are thrilled to share our outstanding experience with Dr. Ruupali Wanckhede and her team! From consultation to completion, doctor exceeded our expectations in every way. Her expertise, professionalism, and genuine care made my husband feel at ease throughout the entire tooth implantation process.

The procedure itself was flawless, with impressive attention to detail. The follow-up care and instructions were clear and thorough, ensuring a smooth recovery.

I recommend Dr. Ruupali Wanckhede for her exceptional skill, kindness, and dedication to delivering top-notch dental care.

If you're considering dental implants or any other procedure, look no further! She is truly exceptional, and I feel grateful to have a family Dentist :) 

Sincerely,
Deepak and Nancy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: **5 Stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐**I recently visited Dr. Ruupali Wanckhede with my daughter for her dental issues, and I couldn't be more pleased with the experience. Dr. Wanchede is incredibly polite and respectful to her patients, creating a welcoming atmosphere that puts both children and parents at ease. Typically, kids are apprehensive about visiting doctors and dentists, but I was amazed to see my daughter excited for her follow-up visit. This speaks volumes about Dr. Wanchede's excellent approach and skill. Thanks to her expertise, the issue has been resolved permanently. I highly recommend Dr. Wanchede for anyone seeking a compassionate and highly competent dentist.

Dr. Ruupali is very friendly doctor....she explains the dental issue and how she is going to do the procedure and always guides us as to which procedure will be best and cost effective for us. My teen daughter also had her teeth filling done which she was extremely scared of ,but Dr. Ruupali made her comfortable and with lots of patience she dealt with her. I have been visiting her since last 8 years and I love her work so much that I always prefer her over other dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Ruupali is very professional. Very knowledgeable and experienced in her field.  First of all, She makes you feel comfortable. She properly explains the problem to the patient and the treatment which is required to fix the problem. 

Her clinic is very clean and she uses the best of equipments. 

Her treatment is extremely satisfactory and very cost effective.

review: I like dr  rupali wanchkhede a lot. Very friendly  and  explains  everything perfectly in easy language. Does work quite fast. I'd recommend her to my relatives and friends.  Reasonably affordable  rates. Uses good quality materials  for dentistry. very happy with her work.I've  already recommended her to my known people.

She was very friendly and explained the problem in detail. Also helped me calm down as the procedure was a bit painful and helped me divert mu mind.

review: An amazing doctor..she made me feel so comfortable and took away my fear of the dentist's chair..my root canal treatment was thoroughly painless and gentle...I would recommend her highly because not only me I could observe how she treated another old patient with so much kindness and a big smile..God bless her..
